item.title: AI Helps Make Transplantable Brains
item.description: AI and stem-cell organoids may overcome brain-transplant obstacles, restoring function and revolutionizing neurological healing.

item.title: When Medicine Becomes Marketing: How Celebrities Are Selling GLP-1s, Peptides And Longevity Through Telehealth
item.description: Ro, Hims, and other telehealth and longevity companies are using celebrity to sell GLP-1s, imaging and diagnostics —raising FDA concerns.

item.title: A ‘Solo Leveling’ Movie Reportedly Exists, May Release Surprisingly Soon
item.description: A new report says a Solo Leveling movie may be coming to theaters before season 3, but the alleged release date does not seem likely.
